1.content: Revise ClaimGuru authentication and client intake with Stripe integration
1.details: 1. Fix OAuth and authentication system errors. 2. Implement Stripe payment integration for client onboarding. 3. Revise sign-up flow to include payment processing. 4. Update client intake workflow with subscription management. 5. Test all authentication and payment flows. 6. Deploy updated system with working auth and Stripe.
